overview:
VascoDe empowers any simple mobile device to interact with web applications, e-mail, social networks and messaging applications; Enabling all people to be connected to community and friends, without downloading any device specific software client.

Ability to compose, reply and delete messages from interface (Gmail over USSD). â–  Mobile twitter â€“ receive and post tweets from any mobile (twitter over USSD). â–  Mobile Facebook/or any other social media application - receive and post updates from any mobile (Facebook over USSD). â–  Mobile WikipediA- query and receive WikipediA term article (Wikipedia over USSD). â–  Mobile Skype â€“ interact and make Skype calls from any phone with no need for data connection. â–  Instant Message â€“ provides simple and quick IM interaction via canned messages (while in-call too). â–  Visual Voice Mail â€“ receive voice mail headers on any mobile device in real time, ability to play, delete, skip messages from interface. In addition, ability to Reject a call with a Message - When called party wishes not to accept a call and reject it or if the call was missed; a screen-pop appears with several pre-composed messages that can be sent to the caller with a proposed action (i.e. in meeting will call in 10 minutes).

The VascoDe CMI (Client-less Mobile Interaction) is an innovative client-less mobile interface enabler. The user interface provided by CMI works on all mobile handsets with no need to install software client on the device and no need for data connection. This unique and patent pending system provides a simple intuitive interface, empowering every user with full real time interaction capabilities to network applications. The CMI is a network component installed on the mobile operatorâ€™s network enabling the mobile operator to provide an interface to web and network applications from all mobile devices that access its network. It is displayed and controlled in the same manner on all mobile devices, simplifying its operation and user friendliness.
